flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to save up $400 because 4 x 100 = <<4*100=400>>400
He has 10 months to earn this money because 12 - 4 = <<12-4=10>>10
He needs to earn $40 a month because 400 / 10 = <<400/10=40>>40
He needs to do 4 tasks a month because 40 / 10 = <<40/10=4>>4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
